long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chroma - Customize Your Web Experience

Chroma lets you personalize your favorite websites 
You can modify colors, fonts, borders, and images on nearly any webpage, giving you more control over your browsing experience.

Features:
User-Friendly Interface: Create and apply custom styles with an intuitive UIâ€”no CSS knowledge required!
Powerful Styling Options: Change backgrounds, tweak fonts, adjust borders, and replace images effortlessly.
Style Sharing: Import user-created stylesheets or export your own designs to share with others.
Flexible: Works on your favorite websites like YouTube, Reddit, Netflix, Twitch, and more!

Other Notes
-Due to the constantly changing nature of the web, some styles might not work as expected
-Chroma does not collect data or send data anywhere
